# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
play <card1> <card2> ... <card5> - Play the selected cards and draw new ones from the deck. You may play up to 5 cards at a time. If you play a hand, you must also respond with the intended hand type you think you are playing, and an estimate of the number of chips you think you will earn from the hand. Use the results of previous hands played to inform your estimate.
discard <card1> <card2> ... <card5> - Discard the selected cards and draw new ones from the deck. You may discard up to 5 cards at a time.
rearrange_hand <card1> <card2> ... <cardN> - Rearrange the hand of cards. Every index in the list of current cards must be present, i.e. if there are 5 cards, the indices 1-5 must be present.

**Strategic Analysis: Consolidating the Hand**

Okay, here's the situation. Big Blind, need 2657 chips to survive, and I've got a decent hand, with some key Jokers. I need to act strategically. Time to crunch some numbers.

First, I see the "Death" consumable. "Select 2 cards, convert the left card into the right card." The description is simple, but execution is key. My hand has a Queen at index 3 and a Steel King at index 4, thanks to that hand rearrangement. That's perfect. Using "Death" now, I turn the Queen into another Steel King. Having two Steel Kings (x1.5 mult) will give me a huge bonus. Steel is the most valuable card in my hand now.

Current Hand: 5 of Spades, Ace of Hearts, Queen of Hearts, Steel King of Hearts, Jack of Hearts, 7 of Hearts (Mult), 8 of Diamonds (Bonus), 4 of Diamonds (Bonus).

I've got a hand of potential. Level 5 with a base of 45 Chips and 5 Mult.

To ensure I win and capitalize on the Steel card, I have to ensure I don't reset "Ride the Bus". I need to play a non-face card. The 7 of Hearts, 8 Diamonds, 4 Diamonds, Ace of Hearts, or even the 5 of Spades, are good non-face card plays. I'll aim for the 7 of Hearts for the added multiplier.

Let's calculate the potential score: Base 45 chips, 5 Multiplier. 7 of Hearts adds 7 chips and 4 mult. The Blue Joker adds 108 Chips. The Mail-In Rebate adds 10 Mult. Ride the Bus adds 14 mult. My two Steel Kings provide a x1.5 multiplier, for a total of x2.25.

Calculations:
Chips: 45 (base) + 7 (card) + 108 (Blue Joker) = 160.
Mult: 5 (base) + 4 (card) + 10 (Joker 4) + 14 (Joker 5) = 33.
Multiplicative: 33 * 1.5 * 1.5 = 74.25
Total Score: 160 * 74.25 = 11,880.

I'm confident I can win easily with 11,880.

So, the plan is simple:
1.  Use the "Death" consumable, converting the Queen at index 3 into a Steel King at index 4.
2.  Play the 7 of Hearts (Mult) to maximize points and retain "Ride the Bus".

I'm checking the JSON now.

Action: `use_consumable`, with the positions array `[1, 3, 4]`. Death is at position 1. Queen is at index 3. Steel King is at index 4.

```json
  "action": "use_consumable",
  "positions": [1, 3, 4]
}
```

The command will make my hand better! Now I can move on to the next play.
